abilities.name: Eater Plague
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this **PSYKER** (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability that are not part of an Attached unit and are not within 12" of this **PSYKER**) and roll one D6: on a 1, this **PSYKER**â€™s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Destroyer Hive
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
